document_data.name: Elserryn Cluster
document_data.mainbody: The '''Elserryn Cluster''' was a zone of the [[Astral Plane]] riddled with [[color pool]]s.
document_data.Description: The zone of the Elserryn Cluster in the Astral contained, within its silvery mists, the head of a dead god and numerous color pools, leading to almost every world in the multiverse.

Geography.Flora & Fauna: [[Faze]]s were known to exist in the cluster.

document_data.History: At some point between {{yearlink|922}} and {{yearlink|1372}}, the head of a dead god in the cluster became the base for [[Crosswinds Keep]].As a [[Red Wizard]] was involved in the creation of Crosswinds Keep, this narrows it down to the period between 922 DR and 1372 DR.
